title: Shut Up and Eat Your Snowshoes!
description: What happens when a city slicker flees the safety of Sardi's for the wilds of Canada?Comedian Jack Douglas had to find out. So he picked up his family - Japanese wife, Reiko, number one son, Bobby, and the well-known Douglas menage: a male-mute, a Pomeranian, five wolves, and a cougar - and took off for the Canadian backwoods (where the nearest mailbox is a mere 116 miles away).
author: Jack Douglas
